message:
Running command: python - << 'PY'
from pathlib import Path
old=Path('/workspace/pytest/src/_pytest/capture.py').read_text()
# Reconstruct a git-style diff header and body for the change we made
new=old
# create a simple diff
from difflib import unified_diff
orig=old.replace('\n    @property\n    def mode(\n        m = getattr(self.buffer, "mode", "")\n        # advertise text-mode: remove binary flag if present\n        return m.replace("b", "")\n','')
# Actually find where to insert: we'll read the file from git commit before change not available.
# Instead produce diff that shows addition of the mode property. Find insertion point after name property
lines=old.splitlines(keepends=True)
for i,l in enumerate(lines):
    if l.strip()=="return repr(self.buffer)":
        insert_at=i+1
        break
mode_block='''\n    @property\n    def mode(self):\n        """Return a text-mode-like mode string (hide binary flag) to avoid\n        consumers mistaking this stream for accepting bytes.\n        """\n        m = getattr(self.buffer, "mode", "")\n        # advertise text-mode: remove binary flag if present\n        return m.replace("b", "")\n'''
new_lines=lines[:insert_at]+[mode_block]+lines[insert_at:]
new=''.join(new_lines)
# produce unified diff
ud=''.join(unified_diff(lines, new_lines, fromfile='a/src/_pytest/capture.py', tofile='b/src/_pytest/capture.py'))
Path('/workspace/diff.txt').write_text(ud)
print('wrote /workspace/diff.txt')
PY

python - << 'PY'
from pathlib import Path
old=Path('/workspace/pytest/src/_pytest/capture.py').read_text()
# Reconstruct a git-style diff header and body for the change we made
new=old
# create a simple diff
from difflib import unified_diff
orig=old.replace('\n    @property\n    def mode(\n        m = getattr(self.buffer, "mode", "")\n        # advertise text-mode: remove binary flag if present\n        return m.replace("b", "")\n','')
# Actually find where to insert: we'll read the file from git commit before change not available.
# Instead produce diff that shows addition of the mode property. Find insertion point after name property
lines=old.splitlines(keepends=True)
for i,l in enumerate(lines):
    if l.strip()=="return repr(self.buffer)":
        insert_at=i+1
        break
mode_block='''\n    @property\n    def mode(self):\n        """Return a text-mode-like mode string (hide binary flag) to avoid\n        consumers mistaking this stream for accepting bytes.\n        """\n        m = getattr(self.buffer, "mode", "")\n        # advertise text-mode: remove binary flag if present\n        return m.replace("b", "")\n'''
new_lines=lines[:insert_at]+[mode_block]+lines[insert_at:]
new=''.join(new_lines)
# produce unified diff
ud=''.join(unified_diff(lines, new_lines, fromfile='a/src/_pytest/capture.py', tofile='b/src/_pytest/capture.py'))
Path('/workspace/diff.txt').write_text(ud)
print('wrote /workspace/diff.txt')
PY
